Abraham in arms, or, The first religious general with his army engaging in a war for which he had wisely prepared and by which not only an eminent victory was obtained, but a blessing gained also / delivered in an artillery-election-sermon, June 3, 1678, by S. N. Nowell, Samuel, 1634-1688.
[4], 19 p.
Printed by John Foster, Boston [Mass.] : 1678.
"To the reader" signed: Samuel Nowell. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
